website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, durable, and with an attractive price point, these swim gloves are designed for everyone from children to adults.
pros: Gloves keep hands warm in cooler water without trapping liquid inside
Dry quickly when done with use
Give excellent drag in the water, creating an effective workout in pecs and shoulders
Can use as a substitute for dumbbells
Fit snugly and don’t fall apart
cons: Can be a bit challenging to put on and take off
Sizes tend to run a big large

customer_reviews.title: Hot water and soap wash twice before using.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves themselves are well made, but whatever they are packaged in is not good. I bought these as a Christmas gift for my daughter, and even with an initial gentle no soap wash, her hands swelled so bad her fingers were straight for 3 days. It was not the material as she is a scuba diver, and after I washed them twice, in a regular wash cycle with soap and hot water, she stopped breaking out and swelling. She does enjoy them, and they work well, but beware to thoroughly wash them at least twice with soap and hot water before using.
customer_reviews.author: L Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I bought a medium as a large was mentioned for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium as a large was mentioned for a man's hand, but they are VERY snug (small). If you are a woman with normal to large hands, definitely go for a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work well for resistance in the water, HOWEVER, they stink to high heaven! I've washed them numerous times and the smell just will not go! Kind of a kerosene type smell which then transfers to your hands!
customer_reviews.author: Seher

customer_reviews.title: Great Adjunct to Workout
customer_reviews.text: Bought these thinking they would generate a more challenging workout. They did this and more. After my first use(1000m), I was met with sore lats and deltoids the following day. After three weeks, decided to take them off and had the easiest workout I’ve ever had! The resistance they offer is perfect for swimmers of all ages but a training necessity for the competitive swimmer that wishes to improve their times. Great product! Only negative is that with continued use, the Velcro ceases to engage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to increase a swim workout
customer_reviews.text: Light and do exactly what they are supposed to. If you are looking for a moderate increase in upper body workout, they are great...to get more intense workout, the plastic hand paddles are the next level. These are well made and very durable. The only thing that makes them difficult is they are hard to get off when they are wet, so if you have hand trouble or arthritis, you might prefer a hand paddle instead.
customer_reviews.author: abby binder

customer_reviews.title: seems to run small
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands, and normally wear a small garden glove. But the small size of these aquatic gloves is too small for me. They also have a strong smell -- perhaps that would fade with use, but I will return them for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: tlb

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good
customer_reviews.text: I have used these gloves for over a year and they were good, but the last two pairs were not. damaged velcro the didn't stick (I returned that pair immediately) and now seams along the thumb that unravel and tear. I am sad. These were good for the price before shoddy materials made them useless.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Heitz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked them. I didn’t know what to expect but I felt they gave my shoulders and arms a better workout. I’m short with small hands and the small size fit great. I didn’t really notice a smell like others have talked about but i didn’t have them on until I was in the water. It gave that extra edge in a good swim workout. I would totally recommend them, especially for the price and quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Chinese sizing does not translate well for the USA.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a snorkeling vacation. Upon arrival, found these to be way too small. They might fit 45, or a child, but not my manly meat hooks. A larger size selection might be helpful, but unless you have tiny hands, these are not worth your time.
customer_reviews.author: Kjcakes

customer_reviews.title: Great if they’d stay together
customer_reviews.text: First pair broke less than two weeks in. The stitching came undone between pointer and middle finger on the right glove. Returned and got a second pair which came undone in the exact same spot only two swims in. My own sewing repair job seems to be holding. As long as the side doesn’t also split like the first glove, they should keep working. I really love these gloves. Comfort, support, resistance, and great for exercising. If they could improve the stitching, they would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lowe Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality for the price, but sizing is off.
customer_reviews.text: I was anxious to try out my new gloves. The price was great and the quality seems very good. Much to my dismay, however, the sizing is off. I carefully measured my hands and ordered the large size. Should probably have gone with the XL. They were really hard to get on, and harder still to get off. Otherwise I recommend them, but remember to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cuchine

customer_reviews.title: VELCRO DOESN'T HOLD
customer_reviews.text: I hate this style for a swim glove. The velcro at the wrist comes apart when moving arms strenuously, causing me tl stop to strap them back together. Also, the bare fingers sticking out are for no reasonsble purpose and are distracting. I had tried to reorder a previous style and didn't realize this style got substituted just because I changed the color desired. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: SCarr

customer_reviews.title: I like these aquatic gloves very much
customer_reviews.text: I like these aquatic gloves very much. I water walk, and these let me exercise my upper body as well. My hands are small, misshapen from arthritis. I first ordered a size small, but they were too tight. The mediums fit, but they are still not easy to get on and off. I wind up using my teeth to pull them off.
customer_reviews.author: ARKan

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if worth the money. I do not own another brand to compare quality or durability
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and easily adjustable. I used these once per week on average until about a month ago, and worked as expected, when useable. The Static Velcro side that is sewn into the glove has completely worn off making the glove unuseable at this point. I am considering just permanently sewing the Velcro area closed and sliding on my hand. Consequently, my wife bought me a pair also for Xmas, having not known I had same pair already. I am hopeful the pair my wife bought me is more sturdy and Velcro does not wear so quickly. Do not know yet if I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: marianne hertzog

customer_reviews.title: My Pecs Hurt!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Lots of water resistance for a super work out! Comfy! Had to buy them for my son After he saw these. Follow-up: The Velcro is of poor quality and the loops are mostly gone. The gloves no longer stay closed at the wrists and the velcro will have to be replaced. The velcro lasted maybe a month (daily laps). Apparently a common complaint so manufacturer has been put on notice. Eh? Moral to the story: If you buy these, order a roll of Velcro tape, too.
customer_reviews.author: A-Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit on my size 7 ring fingers. There's no rubber grip on the inside/palm side. I will require that next time. But that's what I get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for resistance!
customer_reviews.text: No resistance, strange fit .. worthless , I had to return them. I found a much better option . Try the paddles by Aqua Sphere. I use the small and regular..
customer_reviews.author: doris

customer_reviews.title: Velcro not strong or durable enough.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are nice,fit well,and perform pretty good.However my problem with them is the velcro.I swim 3x a week and I've only had these since July 5th.and here we are at August 16th and I've already had to try and replace the velcro because the gloves won't stay closed.I bought a pair in Hawaii a couple of years ago and just recently lost them while on vacation in Fla.I thought these would be an adequate replacement but I was wrong.That was arguably the bedt $10 I've ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these gloves for friend to use in water exercises. They give good cover to the fingers and the wrist was large enough to close without any issue. I did as the instructions stated and aired them outside for a day before using. No residual odor.
customer_reviews.author: dgs50

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used these gloves 6 days a week for the last 2 months. After a month of use the sewing in between one gloves thumb and fore finger came apart as well as the sewing in between 3 of the fingers between both gloves came out. Also, the velcro that hold the wrists is pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: I received these gloves over a month ago and have been using them ever since. Gloves are well made have not shown signs of wear. I was hesitant about which size to order because there is no distinguishing between men’s large or women’s large. So I decided on the large. Im glad I did the glove can be adjusted to stay on by the Velcro that you wrap around the wrist. When dry the glove around the palms are a little tiny bit loose, but the finger part are just right, I wear a size 6 and a half to 7 ring. When swimming and the gloves are wet stoke it’s feel ok the little looseness makes no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Thought these gloves would increase my swim speed, however these gloves are so cumbersome that they actually slowed my progress. Ever been swimming with all your clothes on? Very similar. They are like lead weights on your hands. I found a much better, faster workout without them. I would rate them as completely useless. Also VERY hard to get on and off. Into the trash...
customer_reviews.author: Jack M. Red

customer_reviews.title: Velcro is junk!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves definitely provide a good amount of drag. However after using just two times the Velcro on one glove does not hold at all! Very disappointed. Update: Tagvo is sending me a new pair in 7-15 days. In the mean time, other gloves Velcro is not holding. Second update: Received new gloves sooner than expected...Velcro is holding much better, changed from 2 to 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: falcon70

customer_reviews.title: SMALL SMALL SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly large hands for a woman and these are definitely tight tight tight. Not sure the webbing will add much resistance since there is hardly any between the fingers. The whole hand feels "encased". I can't see how a man with anything larger than a small to medium sized hand could use these. The material and color are fine though as is the velcro strap at the wrist. JUST SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: Appl

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: Hand fit was good, wrists a bit snug. But, the stitching is coming undone after the first wear.
customer_reviews.author: KimM

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves but slippery
customer_reviews.text: These neoprene gloves provide very good resistance during water aerobics. What I like least is that they are slippery so I have to remove them before using the ladder at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: WendyBG

customer_reviews.title: They work better for aqua fit than they do for the aqua ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these gloves for aqua fit and aqua Zumba. They work better for aqua fit than they do for the aqua Zumba. I’m not good enough at Zumba to keep up with the gloves on. My instructor says if I keep at it with them, I will be able to keep up.
customer_reviews.author: TCamp72

customer_reviews.title: Work well, just not durable
customer_reviews.text: I received the gloves and have worn them about 12 times, I us them to help paddle for surfing. Intially they worked really well with a noticable improvement in the power of my paddling. Then slowly the velcro stopped holding and became weak and they need refastened a lot. And now the stitching is coming apart on the wrists. Overall, they have been worth the price, since they started out working well. I just they would have been more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome resistance! I had to actually take them off ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome resistance! I had to actually take them off after a while lol I got a great arm workout while water jogging. They dry really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Chynah

customer_reviews.title: So far so good....
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. I use these for aqua aerobics and they are great. As some have noted the smell is a bit strong but about what you would expect of a neoprene product. My previous gloves were Speedos which lasted about 2 years. Will see if these last as long but I would say that at least initially I like the feel and water resistance of these more than the Speedo gloves.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these gloves for lap swimming a couple weeks ago. Seem to be holding up well. Wish they offered a XL as the large is a little tight (I'm normally a size 10 glove). They do have a strong neoprene smell when new, does fade over time. I washed them a couple times with light dish soap and rinsed well, seem to help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this gloves in size small for my wife and it fit perfectly. It can be use for a resistant swimming or any water workout. Its affordable and work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin D Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: Protects your hands
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like getting a lot of sun but love spending time at the pool. I wear a long sleeved swim shirt but was getting too much sun on my hands. These solved that problem. Unfortunately the gloves are a little too wide to use easily with water aerobic dumbbells, but I’m still very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A. in Winston-Salem, NC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. I use them for resistance exercise in the pool. They say the large are for men, but I ordered the large and they fit perfect. I’ve only used them for the summer, so don’t know how they will hold up long term. Seem sturdily made. I would recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen L. Hitchins

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and useful
customer_reviews.text: I rated a 4 because although they provide resistance, it is not a night and day difference between paddling bare handed. I was hoping for a little more push - but I would estimate it give me a 10% advantage over bare hands. I use them when paddling on flat river pools on an air mattress. I would still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pager

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent but not going to last in the treated pool water. The Velcro is not a tiny patch, unlike other mitts I got from a different seller on Amazon. Size is for male hands I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Anony MouseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great physical therapy.
customer_reviews.text: I have a messed up shoulder and these gloves add just enough resistance to give my shoulder muscles a workout without over doing it. They also help me swim faster. This is the second pair I’ve bought because my brother loved them so much he stole my first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect...just what I was looking for to increase arm/shoulder workout in water aerobics! They're a "little" challenging to put on/take off but that's to be expected if you get a nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: Poodlemom

customer_reviews.title: Still Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves. They give the added resistance in the water for your workout. Another feature I appreciate is the easy on and easy off during class when we use our weights. I wish I could keep better track of them...I keep losing them but that is my fault.
customer_reviews.author: NoNi10

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are great for pool aerobics. Last about 2 years in the chlorine, stay black, the Velcro died..that’s the only dis. Otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: cooker

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Survived daily use in the AZ sunshine/pool environment without fraying. Size was accurate. Comfortable. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting Aquatic swim gloves
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've purchased this particular brand of aquatic gloves and my favorite pair, so far. These fit my hands better, the velcro actually holds, and the finger length & width is great! I will buy this brand, again.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Order. One size up as they run small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered large but these gloves are tight. I wear a large in golf gloves by many manufacturers. These are just too tight. I tried them so not returnable. If you buy these please keep the fact that these gloves run small in size.
customer_reviews.author: Ken in The Villages

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: a bit of effort to get them on but sturdy, comfortable and well made for a great price- and they helped me optimize my workout!
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Velcro doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: These swim gloves are great for resistance in the water. I wear them daily for my swim workouts. The velcro however stopped holding while in the water after a few months. I'm not sure why, but mid workout they would come undone. I decided to take the velcro off and instead sewed on some very large snaps that I bought from a craft store. That is the only reason why I would not give them a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great function and good value.
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 star except for two things: a) sizing: I have ordinary sized hands and the 'LARGE' was really way too small. b) strap: velcro gummed up after a couple months. Might have been aggravated by seaweed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: large isn't large enough
customer_reviews.text: can't rate durability because I can barely get my hands in them. Heard a stich/tear trying to get my hands in. They must have used a small model. I generally buy Xlarge gloves, not for my fingers but my hand itself. Big hands beware
customer_reviews.author: Kendi!!!

customer_reviews.title: These work great for either lap swims or water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: These work great for either lap swims or water aerobics. Not as large as some but they are what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: After 10 times in the pool the gloves would not stay closed
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro on the gloves are worthless, I do water aerobics and so my arms are constantly moving and the Velcro that supposedly keeps the gloves closed constantly reopens during my workout, these gloves suck big time, wish I never bought them...My advice dont BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off yet stay on securely. An excellent value for a glove that adds resistance to my water exercise. Have used twice a week for several weeks with no issues. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Annacabana

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for me! The are a material that allows me to control the level of resistance by spreading my fingers. They’re comfy and easy to use on all strokes that I do. Tips of fingers are exposed so you can do things without removing them!
customer_reviews.author: Egold

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are wonderful! The quality is great & just perfect for my hands for aerobic exercise! Previous gloves which was another brand fell apart but I believe these with hold up just fine!!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: They’re Great for pool Workouts
customer_reviews.text: I do water workouts several times a week. I use these webbed gloves instead of water dumbells. I love them! I’m not sure how I would feel about swimming g with them, but they are perfect for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: WildGoose

customer_reviews.title: Love these swim gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These swim gloves are the best I have ever used. After using swim gloves that have zippers, I love the velcro closers. They are comfortable and easy to use. I enthusiastically endorse these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: A. H. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know Your size
customer_reviews.text: I probably should’ve got a size up there just so tight I don’t want to use on I should’ve exchange them for I tried to use a massage maybe they would stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Redbeauty

customer_reviews.title: They are cheaply made and inexpensive compared to other brands
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of product for years but this brand is not well made compared to others that I use. I will keep this pair as backup only...they are not my first choice
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Jones

customer_reviews.title: Should have stuck with my last brand
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, but the velcro straps on both wrists keep coming undone. Won't buy these again. Also, any one who is between sizes, I would recommend going with the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: BDW

customer_reviews.title: fabulous workout
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to turn my swimming pool into a workout pool. I get a much better workout. They feel comfortable and fit great. Super price for a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: florida62

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for aqua aerobics
customer_reviews.text: These aquatic gloves offer a bit more resistant in the water. I wear size small and have small wrists The wrist on these gloves, though adjustable are very small. That said, I am very happy with this product and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: thea pallay

customer_reviews.title: Enhance your swimming
customer_reviews.text: These did not work quite as well as I thought they would. The size medium was really a size small. They are definitely waterproof and they dry very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves for working out in my pool. They fit true to size as I am a medium and that's what I ordered. They fit like a glove! LOL I crack myself up!
customer_reviews.author: N D

customer_reviews.title: Sized too small
customer_reviews.text: Sized way too small, as is often the case with items made in China. I am a man with medium size hands. I ordered LARGE but I can barely get these on.
customer_reviews.author: Johann Sebastian Fu

customer_reviews.title: Like a soar thumb..
customer_reviews.text: They offer some resistance until you get ready to take them off they run small they are tight on your hands. I stop wearing them because I got tired of trying to take them off. The tip of your fingers stick out..
customer_reviews.author: I'm keeping it real..

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement to my pool workout.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely improves workout in pool by increasing resistance. I usually wear a men's size of large or medium in regular gloves, and the larger works great with these. Wouldn't want to go smaller than a large, though.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: still holding up
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these after the previous pair, a different manufacture, started to come apart at the seams after 2 weeks. so far i have used these almost every day, for over 6 weeks, and still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Rob J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The stitches started coming apart only after a month of use. The wrist velcro strap is so week that as soon as you start swimming they open.
customer_reviews.author: Siamak Masoudi

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit of the glove and works great for my aqua aerobics class. The biggest bonus is that it's mine and not for public use. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Patti H

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work well for some resistance are comfortable. I have petite hands & ordered the small & it was too tight. It was difficult to get them on, make a fist or grab anything comfortably. I had to reorder a second pair in the medium which worked out much better. The small is definitely for a child.
customer_reviews.author: MFP

customer_reviews.title: Good glove for the money .
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for water aerobics, and they work fine. They are a good deal for the money, HOWEVER the men’s large run very small . I do not have an especially large hand and can barely get them on .
customer_reviews.author: TONY BELLORA

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old granddaughter has been enjoying these Aquatic gloves in the pool. They are soft & easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.author: Shirley R.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for - I swim 30 mins/day and just wanted a little resistance to add to workout. The medium was a perfect fit - as a point of reference from my wrist to my longest finger is 7 in ... probably good for 8 - 8.5 inches
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Effective product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior (72) lady and I snorkel swim for excercise. I definitely feel a difference as I approach lap number 29 & 30.
customer_reviews.author: miemani

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: The size chart wasn't very accurate so they are too big when wet. They really give me a great workout in the pool. They feel well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona D

customer_reviews.title: Needs better velcro
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Velcro attachment should be better quality as it opens up during swimming. But nevertheless its still usable. But annoying
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: They work great, but I would suggest eating a size smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great, but I would suggest eating a size smaller than you usually wear because in the water they feel too loose. Other than that they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and use you flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I got little to not resistance. If anything it made me think of another way and just used my rubber flip flops. Way more resistance and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mindpunch

customer_reviews.title: The velcro wore out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love the sizing, stitching and general fit. Unfortunately although I received them in January and could not swim due to Covid-10 until 3 weeks ago, the velcro gave in too fast. That should be improved, now I use rubber bands to keep the gloves stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Hudson

customer_reviews.title: These get too heavy
customer_reviews.text: The gloves get water logged and by the time I'm done with my laps they weight five pounds a piece because of the material they are made from.
customer_reviews.author: Ct

customer_reviews.title: quality materials
customer_reviews.text: These work great in my water aerobics classes. Solid velcro closures. Good fit - true to my large (size 8) hands.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like them. I got them to swim laps and do water exercise. They offer extra resistance and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mick S

customer_reviews.title: Worked!!!! Loved it to keep up without fins.
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome! Silicone ones failed, I tested one on one hand and this neoprene on the other. Was sturdy, and was helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Wrist straps keep coming loose. They are Velcro so I am not sure if anything could be done about it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Surfing
customer_reviews.text: Note for surfing the material (I assume neoprene) does not give you a good grip on the surfboard. Although putting wax on the rails where you grab helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: great upper body work out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for therapy after shoulder surgery, and they work great. Non impact, no grunting, just a nice work out.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R Mavroudis

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my low impact water exercise routine. I am a woman with big hands and the large size fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hrubesky

customer_reviews.title: Warmth, drag, and potential speed increase.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my hands warm while allowing my fingers tips to function when needed. Overall seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: gary a jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Good swim gloves
customer_reviews.text: Good standard swim gloves. I have used swim gloves by several vendors. Most are quite effective and will last a decent time until pool chemicals and use will break them down. These are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Francis S. Billak

customer_reviews.title: No resistance or very little.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves do not provide enough resistance in the water to be beneficial for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: cat k

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: I found that the size I ordered were just slightly smaller than what i wanted. the quality is the best I have had in the last 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: John Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great add to my workout
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They add to my water work out. Use them almost every day. Easy on and off. I got the larger size. Nice work out for arms and shoulders!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for swim workout
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. Nice quality and they stay in place. I recommend them I bought size Medium. I'm 5'3" and they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GilbertGirl

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL BLUE
customer_reviews.text: very nice quality item, light weight, well designed, bought second pair for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Mycle

customer_reviews.title: A PLUS FOR FITNESS IN THE WATER
customer_reviews.text: GREAT GLOVES FOR EXERCISE, ALL IS MORE AND BETTER. I LOVE THESE. GOOD FIT, EASY ON-OFF, DRY OVERNIGHT. RECOMMEND. ALSO KEEP HANDS WARM IN COLDER WATER.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hendy

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a kid
customer_reviews.text: They were too big for my 6 year old but I guess he will grow into them in 3 years LOL
customer_reviews.author: beauty4life

customer_reviews.title: Good resistance in water
customer_reviews.text: These work great for resistance in the pool when you want to work your arms
customer_reviews.author: R. Bostwick

customer_reviews.title: water gloves
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro keeps coming loose in water aerobics class. otherwise fine
customer_reviews.author: MollyKnoll

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We have a small pond and the kids like to paddle around on tubes. This was perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: toddler mom

customer_reviews.title: These gloves bleed & when wet & around other items, including clothes & towels will ruin them
customer_reviews.text: This is mainly a good product if separated from items in your gym bag. I use these for lap swimming & have ruined two nice towels because they bleed when wet. Although I like these for swimming, cannot recommend as they will ruin your items if in close quarters such as a gym bag. I believe if the manufacturer addresses this problem, they would be fine
customer_reviews.author: Designer Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but seems poorly made
customer_reviews.text: After using these for a few months, the base of the glove starts to tear and the Velcro does not stay clasped. The product does fit comfortably on the hand, but is not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Alan Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Holding up so far
customer_reviews.text: Holding up so far. I use them 3-4 times a week. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Robbob

product_meta.title: TAGVO Aquatic Gloves for Helping Upper Body Resistance, Webbed Swim Gloves Well Stitching, No Fading, Sizes for Men Women Adult Children Aquatic Fitness Water Resistance Training
feature_bullets: GREAT WATER RESISTANCE: webbed gloves for water resistance training, great resistance gloves for an upper body workout in the pool, help tone and strengthen muscles
EASY GETTING ON & OFF: these swimming gloves are easy to get on and off, with adjustable wrist strap to keep it from falling off in water
SIZES: the small water gloves for women with small hands & children; medium for women with average-sized hands; large for men

WELL BUILT & COMFORTABLE: the neoprene gloves are comfortable and made very well with good stitching, no fading. just enjoying your aquatic fitness class, swim laps, surfing and body boarding, diving better with these webbed hands

SATISFACTION & MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: your purchase is backed by our 100% REFUND PROMISE that if this purchase did not EXCEED your expectations, we will make your Money Back Refund 100% within 30-Day. or if you need a replacement, just please send it back our way within 30 days.
